name: Asimina triloba
details: Acne. Itching in evening on undressing.Produces a series of symptoms much like scarlet fever; sore throat, fever, vomiting, scarlet eruption; tonsils and submaxillary glands enlarged, with diarrhoea. Fauces red and swollen, face swollen. Desire for ice-cold things. HOARSENESS. Languid, drowsy irritable.
